Texts.Chs: 现在你对如何使用你得到的资源已经有了一定的概念，也许我们是时候来点更深奥的了？你可以通过建造^orange;电子设备制造机^reset;来入门。有了它，我们可以建造各种动力设备来实现自动化生产。
Texts.Eng: Now that you have a firm concept of how to use your well-earned resources, perhaps it is time we delve into something more cerebral? You can start by making an ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;. With one, we can build all sorts of powered equipment to automate production, among other things!

Texts.Chs: 这将使您的实验室水平真正提升一个档次！我建议你尽快学习使用 ^orange;物品传输器^reset;。当配合^orange;Terminals^reset;与动力机械使用时，这门技术非常强大 。
Texts.Eng: This will really bring your lab to the next level! I recommend learning to use an ^orange;Item Transference Device^reset; as soon as you can. It is a truly powerful piece of technology when paired with ^orange;Terminals^reset; and powered machinery.
